caption.center: SOLIN NORRIX, Individually and as Guardian, Respondent, v. ERNEST

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division One.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for King County, No. 749912, William C. Goodloe, J., entered October 11, 1973.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed by unpublished opinion per James, J., concurred in by Williams, C.J., and Swanson, J.Page 1007
